page.title: 03LLANDERLO CONTINUED
page.content:
Ecology
Wettest year
Education There are no schools in this block and chidren attend schools in nearby Bethlehem Ffairfach Llanderlo. Some older children go away to boarding school.
Employment Almost entirely farm work The Water Treatment Works provide work for the people and deal with a million gallons of raw water to provide water for Llanderlo and district and then to Swansea and the grid. There is one unemployed man and wife with two unemployed teenagers. They have some sheep and have also converted some outbuildings into a row of 3 flatets
